website_summaries.verdict: The one to choose if supporting the urinary tract and digestive health is top priority.
pros: Non-GMO verified and no refrigeration needed
cons: Product should be stored at or below 74° F in a cool, dry place
Some consumers report product arrived warm, with warmed packaging
Some users report nausea after taking, so consider taking with food

customer_reviews.title: Interstitial Cystitis
customer_reviews.text: It has been almost two years since I have started having bladder problems. After much research on potentially having Interstitial Cystitis, these capsules are the only thing I have found that I faithfully take. Along with following a diet and minimizing possible trigger intake, I hope I will never have a flare up again.
customer_reviews.author: pat mclaughlan

customer_reviews.title: A must have for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this product by mistake and I guess I had the luck of the Irish when I bought it. I take medications daily for medical conditions and sometimes the cause me to get UTIs. This on antibiotic every time I have taken it I have gotten a UTI. So the same day I stated my antibiotic I took this probiotic and it not only help my stomach but for the first time in almost 10 years I did not get a UTI. I highly recommend this product to anyone who gets UTI or has stomach issues taken antibiotics. I had no side effects at all from the antibiotics which I usually have when I take them.
customer_reviews.author: Deac73

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Haven't had an UTI since I started taking it, but was burdened with them prior.
customer_reviews.author: ladyshopper

customer_reviews.title: My wife swears by this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears by this stuff! Since starting a regular dose of this, she has not suffered one single UTI! Before that, it was about every 2-3 months, and had become a serious problem! Who wants to be on an ABX reginem every couple of months!!?? Do I know if this is what put an end to the problem? Well, correlation is not causation - but, we are gonna stick with this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life Dr Formulated Probiotics for UTI
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these probiotics from Garden of Life for over a year now. Never had a problem, until today. I received my order yesterday, opened the bottle and this is what I got. It most of the capsules have holes, and others have been separated. Pink powder everywhere! I called Amazon customer service to complain, and the person I talked to is shipping out a replacement ASAP. Doesn’t this go through quality control??
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Barrios-Arguello

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again and again. :)
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from horrible, painful UTI! However, this has helped me treat UTI the moment I feel it coming on. Great product! Great brand. Thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love that it is shelf stable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love that it is shelf stable. Garden of life is a great brand of supplements. My only concern with this product is taking it for long periods. With 50 billion CFU's that is high for a healthy individual. I would only recommending taking the full 30 days after a UTI event.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: It's been years that I've been suffering from unexplained UTI's. I'm so done with antibiotics. About a year ago I researched probiotics for the urinary tract. I've tried many different brands and most have helped but not cured or prevented. it's about 2-3 weeks since starting this and the difference is evident and welcomed! I will update again after a few months. I am in hopes that I found what I've been hoping for. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I kept having uti ! This helped me to get rid of it. I was not having too much expectation even. So I ll be buying it again. And hope the company keeps the quality. there were three broken capsules in the bottle. But in general it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Capsules in both bottles were busted, loose powder everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is usually a great product but this time the capsules inside BOTH bottles I ordered were busted. The casing is thin ans brittle and the probiotic powder is loose inside the bottle. I'm not even sure they are still effective in this state so WASTE OF OF MONEY. Find another supplier for this product.
customer_reviews.author: KOals

customer_reviews.title: Believe it works, however . . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for approximately 8 months now and have been happy with the results. However, in every single bottle there have been at least one or more of the capsules broken and the powdery contents on the bottom of the bottle. Therefore I am going to try another product that is a tablet. Hopefully this will work as well and i won't be losing some of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JS.

customer_reviews.title: I took the hole bottle as recommended, and I still have trouble with my reoccurring ...
customer_reviews.text: I took the hole bottle as recommended, and I still have trouble with my reoccurring UTI's. It was worth the try.

customer_reviews.title: the capsule is easy to take and the recommendation came from a very ...

customer_reviews.title: Short changed twice!
customer_reviews.text: I have subscribed for several months now these two products. This is the second time I have been short pills or found empty in the bottles. I was recommended this brand from my Urologist’s. I thought it was a reputable brand, but apparently not.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best for women!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for years and I haven't had a UTI or any other problem since I started taking these. Can't live without them!

customer_reviews.title: very healing
customer_reviews.text: With 50 billion of those little bacteria moving around in my gut, after a month I started to see an end to my diarrhea. It has been caused by my Collagenous Colitis. For the first time in over 15 years, I have been able to get off medication that wasn't helping very much. I am now symptom free. The only complaint is I have to worry about gaining weight again!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Remsberg

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t feel good after taking these
customer_reviews.text: These made me not feel good. I won’t take them again. For the cost you can get prescription from your gastroenterologist. I take Restora RX and they make me feel great. I tired garden of life brand a few times and each day I didn’t feel well after taking them. Can’t recommend. Maybe I just got a bad batch. Not taking any chance with them. I’ll stick with the prescription brand ( Restora RX ).
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: One of the best health choices I ever made!!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic saved my stomach!! I was diagnosed with Crohn's Disease. The same doctor who had diagnosed me, did a colonoscopy, and he could find no evidence of it. I had no inflammation anywhere. That's after almost 2 years on the brand probiotics. I can not possibly recommend them enough. But start on a lower dose because it will send your body through a detox. It makes you feel sick. But it's normal and it passes. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NmTrekker

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent UTI's!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these based on other's reviews. So far they have worked great! I haven't had a UTI in over 2 months. Prior to that it seems like I was having them every month. So far so good! I've ordered another bottle

customer_reviews.title: Consistency and patience
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend for every man over 30. This supplement helped my husband with an issue that doctors said he would have to deal with for life. Initially taking this supplement seemed to not have any impact. After 8 months my husband is now catheter free!

customer_reviews.title: Actually seem to work for urinary problems
customer_reviews.text: Had been having recurring infections for over 9 months. The doctors assistant told me she had started taking probiotics and I decided to try these. That was several months ago and no infections or discomfort since for me.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as sold in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same product as sold in stores. I don't know what is in there but It triggered anxiety. Why would someone sell fake supplement pills on here that can potentially harm people? I didn't feel that way after taking the ones bought in stores. It's awful that supplement pills aren't regulated on Amazon. It's such a health hazard for everyone.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

I ordered these and they are coming today! I can't wait to get started on them again! They may be cost about $10-$15 more than the other brand but SO WORTH IT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Seems to keep away actual sickness in addition to UTIs
customer_reviews.text: This is totally anecdotal, but my wife swears she stopped getting sick during cold/flu season once she started taking these. She used to get sick at least twice a year before, and it would last for weeks. They also seem to be good at preventing UTIs, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Drowsy in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My mother is in her eighties and has had considerable issues with reoccurring urinary tract infections. She also has issues with gut health, gas and bloating. After using the product she has been urinary infection free for almost a year. Her gut health has improved also. We highly recommend this product!

I've been having problems with my urinary track, but everytime I bring it up to my doctor, she says she can't find anything wrong. Well, these probiotics fixed the thing the doctor couldn't find! I'm very impressed! And, oh, they did their work after a couple of weeks even tho I only took one about every other day because I kept forgetting.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use a variety of Garden of LIfe probiotics - I usually just buy whatever is on sale at the time. So sometimes I buy the one for urinary tract, sometimes the ultra, sometimes the mood one, etc. After every bottle I switch. They all seem to target a different area (how? I don't know) but I can ALWAYS tell. I'm a healthy person and take probiotics daily, sometimes twice a day, sometimes I forget. I find that this particular brand just works the best and has the most noticeable improvements for me. I've tried other brands but I keep coming back to Garden of LIfe probiotics - whatever one, they are all great.
customer_reviews.author: jodiealoha

I've lost around 10 of these capsules so far. what changed?

customer_reviews.title: Only thing better than antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I've had chronic UTI's for several years, like I was getting a UTI every two to four months for three years, taking the antibiotics the doctor would give me every time, and getting another UTI again not much later. Then I discovered these magic UTI destroying pills! Whenever I start to feel symptoms come on now, I just take one of these per day for four days or so, and the UTI always goes away. I haven't had to go to the doctor for a UTI for a couple years now since I started taking these. I highly recommend, also to help curb antibiotic resistance.

I have really liked this brand for a long time and I’m disappointed they are not more responsible about choosing safe packaging. I will no longer purchase Garden of Life products for this reason.

product_meta.title: Garden of Life - Dr. Formulated Probiotics Urinary Tract+ - Acidophilus Probiotic Supports Urinary Tract Health, Digestive Balance - Gluten, Dairy, and Soy-Free - 60 Vegetarian Capsules
product_meta.description: Style:Shelf StableProbiotics are important to support a woman’s immune system, so Dr. Perlmutter created this unique formula with probiotics, clinically studied organic whole cranberry and vitamin D3 to support healthy urinary tract function and promote the growth of good bacteria.† More specifically, Urinary Tract + contains 500mg of organic Pacran cranberry, the clinically studied amount in Gold Standard human trials.† Pacran is certified organic cranberry powder specifically designed to support urinary tract health.† Urinary Tract + also contains 50 billion CFU from 16 probiotics, including L. reuteri and L. acidophilus NCFM, plus whole food vitamin D (1,000IU) nutrient support for immune system health.†
feature_bullets: DIGESTION SUPPORT: This 50 billion CFU probiotic supplement contains L. reuteri, Lactobaccilus acidophilus and Bifidobacteria for digestive health and constipation relief
PROBIOTIC WITH CRANBERRY: Contains organic pacran cranberry powder and whole food vitamin D3 for urinary tract support
IMMUNE SUPPORT: This dietary supplement has 50 billion CFU and 16 probiotic strains for immune system health

SHELF STABLE PROBIOTICS: This 50 billion probiotic comes in 60 capsules; no refrigeration required HYPOALLERGENIC PROBIOTIC: Our probiotics supplement is dairy free, gluten free, soy free, vegetarian, and made with over 70 percent organic ingredients

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
